title: Digital-Based Self-Regulated Learning Training Program to Improve Mathematics Achievement

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Focuses on adult learners acquiring and applying self-regulated learning strategies to solve mathematics problems directly relevant to daily life, with VR simulations providing realistic learning contexts.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and apply self-regulated learning strategies with over 80% accuracy during mathematics problem-solving processes
Learners can improve mathematics problem-solving efficiency by over 30% using behavioral and environmental regulation strategies in VR simulations
Learners can solve real-life problems by applying cognitive strategies acquired through self-regulated learning during project-based assessments

resources: Tablet for Digital Learning Platform Access (Rental)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
